pr_title: [7.x] Add analytics plugin usage stats to _xpack/usage (#54911)

timeline.message:
Add analytics plugin usage stats to _xpack/usage (#54911)

Adds analytics plugin usage stats to _xpack/usage.

Closes #54847
Rename test for consistency with master
Make index name in test more unique

timeline.bodyText: Should this be a VLong not ZLong?
timeline.author: polyfractal

replies.bodyText: It was ZLong in 7.6, got partially changed by mistake in 7.7. So, I am returning to back to the original serialization method and I will open a PR to fix it in 7.7. Good catch, thanks for reminding me!
replies.author: imotov

replies.bodyText: I opened #55183. Not sure if it will make it into 7.7.0 or not.
replies.author: imotov
